title: Relates to the study of law in certain non approved law schools to be eligible to sit for the New York state bar exam
summary: Relates to the study of law in certain non American Bar Association approved law schools to be eligible to sit for the New York state bar exam, so long as they meet all other requirements established pursuant to 22 NYCRR Part 520.03.
actClause: AN ACT relating to the study of law in certain law schools to be eligible to sit for the New York state bar exam
